author: Brandt Huseman
body:
Hi Loyal Reader,

You recently saw Charles Mizrahi’s presentation on the electric vehicle battery revolution…

In it, he revealed how the Forever Battery is predicted to cause a 1,500% surge in EV sales over the next 4 years…

And how that tailwind will cause one secretive company’s stock to skyrocket.

But you somehow got bumped off the order form and you still don’t have access to his two new reports … The Forever Battery: How to Profit as EV Sales Grow 1,500% Over the Next 4 Years … and A New Era of Energy Storage: The Hottest Breakthrough of the 21st Century.

I’d really hate for you to miss out on this. I know you were interested before … because you had started filling out the order form.

So, I want to give you one last chance to complete your order.

Remember, you get:

One-year membership to Alpha Investor.

Twelve monthly issues.

Access to the model portfolio.

Weekly alerts and updates.

The Alpha Investor Investing Manual.

Access to a private members-only website.

A dedicated customer care team.

And of course, most important of all, your free copy of The Forever Battery: How to Profit as EV Sales Grow 1,500% Over the Next 4 Years … and A New Era of Energy Storage: The Hottest Breakthrough of the 21st Century.

That’s $199 in value for only $47.

But this is your last chance to be taken directly back to the order page, so you can finish filling it out. You don’t want to miss this opportunity. So please…

Click here to order now.

Sincerely,

Brandt Huseman Director of Customer Experience Alpha Investor

subject: Your Order Didn’t Go Through

author: Brandt Huseman
body:
Hi Loyal Reader,

Charles Mizrahi asked me to reach out to you on his behalf.

You recently saw his presentation on how a new battery technology is set to cause electric vehicle sales to skyrocket 1,500% in the next four years.

And it looks like you were interested in his special reports, The Forever Battery: How to Profit as EV Sales Grow 1,500% Over the Next 4 Years … and A New Era of Energy Storage: The Hottest Breakthrough of the 21st Century.

But for some reason, your order didn’t go through.

That’s why I’m sending you this quick note.

I don’t want you to miss out and I’ve saved your order for you.

You can finish signing up for

If you have any other questions, please give us a call at 866-584-5096. We’re open Monday through Friday 9 a.m. to 8 p.m. ET.

Sincerely,

Brandt Huseman Director of Customer Experience Alpha Investor
preheader: Charles Mizrahi asked me to reach out to you on his behalf.
subject: Oops, You Didn’t Complete Your Order.

author: Charles Mizrahi
body:
Dear Loyal Reader,

I just wanted to check in quickly to make sure everything is alright.

It looks like you were about to get your free copy of … The Forever Battery: How to Profit as EV Sales Grow 1,500% Over the Next 4 Years … and A New Era of Energy Storage: The Hottest Breakthrough of the 21st Century … but your order wasn’t completed.

This new battery technology is a breakthrough that will change the way we live forever. And for early investors, it is the opportunity of a lifetime.

That’s why I want you to claim your free reports TODAY.

I want to help you succeed financially and build your wealth. I believe Alpha Investor can do that.

Now, for some reason, your order form wasn’t completed. Perhaps you forgot or maybe it was a technical issue on our end.

Either way, you can finish your order here.

Once you do, review your copy of The Forever Battery: How to Profit as EV Sales Grow 1,500% Over the Next 4 Years … and A New Era of Energy Storage: The Hottest Breakthrough of the 21st Century.

Don’t miss out. Get your free reports here.

Regards,

Charles Mizrahi Founder, Alpha Investor
preheader: I just wanted to check in quickly to make sure everything is alright.
subject: Did Something Go Wrong?
